description:
Createserverext extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
title: Createserverext doesn't have API Sample Tests to Documentation

comments.content:
Createserverext extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maurosr

comments.content:
Two points to 'won't fix':
- Currently createserverext doesn't add any functionality to the API.
- Due to the first point this api entry point will probably be removed on nova APIv3

So no need to worry about it's api samples.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maurosr
